scenes.background: [Bob] sits back down, looking unsure. [Monica] frowns.
scenes.description: Do we really have enough information to make this call?

options.text: We can make an educated guess with the data we have.
options.analysis: You encouraged a decision based on available data, showing good social skills but less self-regulation and motivation.

options.text: Let's gather more details to ensure we're making the best decision.
options.analysis: You advocated for thorough data collection, showing good emotional perception and self-regulation.

options.text: We don't have all the answers, but sometimes we need to take a leap of faith.
options.analysis: You suggested moving forward despite uncertainties, demonstrating solid motivation and balanced emotional response.
